name: Recycling for My City
description:
4 Difficulty levels:

Easy - Normal - Hard - Legend

Get 1000 Coins

Beat the Legend Difficulty

Win to watch the short cinematic

Play on Browser (PC/Tablet/Mobile)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Game made with Gdevelop5 engine:

https://gdevelop-app.com/

Game sounds made with Bfxr:

https://www.bfxr.net/

Sprites Edited with Piskel:

https://www.piskelapp.com/

80s Throwback #4 (victory instrumental) by astrofreq:

https://pixabay.com/es/users/astrofreq-19902647/

Upright Piano Arcade ( Instrumental Mix ) by hasenchat:

https://pixabay.com/es/users/hasenchat-18853959/

Recycler Sprite by Free Game Assets (GUI, Sprite, Tilesets):

https://free-game-assets.itch.io/free-3-cyberpunk-sprites-pixel-art

Cyberpunk City background by ansimuz:

https://ansimuz.itch.io/cyberpunk-street-environment

Earth Sprite by Helianthus Games:

https://helianthus-games.itch.io/pixel-art-planets

Space background by VectorPixelStar:

https://vectorpixelstar.itch.io/space

Clapboard Clapper Sprite by Jose Moyano:

https://jose-moyano.itch.io/clapper-pixel-art

Drink Can Sprite by ghostpixxells:

https://ghostpixxells.itch.io/pixel-mart

Coin Sprite by La Red Games:

https://laredgames.itch.io/gems-coins-free

Hearth Sprite by DonHellsing:

https://donhellsing.itch.io/heart1

Toxic Battery Sprite by Ruxar:

https://ruxar.itch.io/battery

Medicine Sprite inspired by first aid kit by ReaxionLab:

https://pixabay.com/es/users/reaxionlab-2960337/

Trees Sprite by Admurin:

https://admurin.itch.io/nature-trees

Grass Background by Fawf_art:

https://fawf-art.itch.io/16x16-forest-tileset
